knimeNode.name: Chromatogram Writer (MSD)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is writes chromatographic data into the OpenChrom *.ocb format.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows to write a valid data table into OpenChrom *.ocb format.
fullDescription.option: This is the path of the file to be exported.

views.view: An overview of the chromatogram is displayed here.
